subject: Football (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: It would be hard to fathom how quarterback Johnny Manziel, a redshirt sophomore, could raise his N.F.L. draft status through another college season.
snippet: It would be hard to fathom how quarterback Johnny Manziel, a redshirt sophomore, could raise his N.F.L. draft status through another college season.
